description.en:
Rinnegan is a click to team NFT game project built on the Binance Smart Chain platform, when participating in the game you need to own yourself ninjas and proceed to upgrade them to achieve higher strength, fight with tailed beasts will help you win attractive rewards. Token REN is considered a payment instrument in this game.
Inspired by the legendary Naruto manga series, we created Rinnegan with the hope of giving participants great experiences and values when immersing themselves in a magical world full of ghosts. We are ready to create a fully digital world to turn game characters into valuable, exchangeable and profitable NFT assets. In a simple and innovative way, Rinnegan makes your investing experience as engaging and enjoyable as a game. Users can own monsters, fight enemies, trade, and more.
